timeline.message:
Fix VarHandle coordinateTypes

The first VarHandle parameter type should be removed from the getter in
order to correctly derive the coordinate types.

Signed-off-by: Babneet Singh <sbabneet@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Is getter guaranteed to have at least 1 element at this point?

replies.bodyText: Yes, I believe so. I expect atleast one parameter of type VarHandle for all AccessMode types. Also, copyOfRange correctly returns a zero length array if there is only one parameter.
